Class PluginManager

    • Method Detail

      • findAndSetupPlugins

        public static void findAndSetupPlugins()
                                throws java.io.IOException
        Loads all plugins annotated with Plugin found by the client and plugin class loader.

        This method should only be called once ever.

        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if finding/getting plugins from the plugin directory failed

      • registerEventClass

        public static void registerEventClass(java.lang.Object instance)
        Registers a class that contains EventCallback annotated methods, and maps those methods correctly.

        This method must only be called within Plugin.Setup or in a constructor/initializer of a plugin.

        Parameters:
        instance - an instance of a class containing EventCallback annotated methods

      • activatePlugins

        public static void activatePlugins()
        Activates all plugins.

        Attempts to activate plugins from the directory. If the plugin is toggleable then it will add a new item to the settings panel.

      • activatePlugin

        public static boolean activatePlugin(PluginContainerImpl plugin)
                              throws java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException,
                                     java.lang.IllegalAccessException
        Activates a specific plugin.

        If the plugin fails to activate the settings toggle will be disabled.

        Parameters:
        plugin - the plugin that should be activated
        Returns:
        true if the plugin was successfully activated; false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException - if activating the plugin failed
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException - if activating the plugin failed

      • deactivatePlugins

        public static void deactivatePlugins()
        Deactivate all plugins.

      • deactivatePlugin

        public static void deactivatePlugin(PluginContainerImpl plugin)
        Deactivates a specific plugin.
        Parameters:
        plugin - the plugin that should be deactivated

      • getAllOverlays

        public static java.util.List<Overlay> getAllOverlays()
